subject: RE: Virtual Clock test pattern
msgSnippet: I have done similar things. This applies to calendars as well as clocks, e.g. under test creating a Java new Date() is sometimes not what you want, even
messageBody:
I have done similar things. This applies to calendars as well as clocks,
e.g. under test creating a Java "new Date()" is sometimes not what you want,
even though in the application getting the "current date" *is* what you
want.

-Patrick
